name: Copter ++
description:
Awesome side scrolling copter game with cool graphics. Very simple copter control yet very addictive to play. Can you become a legendary copter pilot???
Four different games modes with Unlimited levels in nine different zones. Each level is progressively challenging with online scores & Ranks.

Can you move up the ranks and become an "Air Marshal"? Well, It is not impossible, but very challenging objective indeed.

Controlling the copter is never so simple & precise. Just touch the screen to propel the copter up and release to bring it down.
But, It needs mastering of your piloting skills to bring the copter out of tight caves & twists.

Four game modes as below.

- Classic Normal
- Classic Continuous
- Challenge Normal
- Challenge COntinuous

In classic game you play each level in different zone with increasing speed & difficulty. In Challenge game you play each level in same zone
with increasing speed uninterrupted until you crash the copter.

With continuous option, the game starts from the last failed level. Whereas normal option always starts from the beginning.

Training Mode : Master your copter piloting skills in seperate training zone with 16 challenging speed settings.


Game Features:

- Four game modes with unlimited levels.
- Training Mode with speed selection.
- Ten unique eye catching environments.
- Simple touch based copter control.
- Online Scores for weekly & monthly scores for all game modes.
- Ten Military ranks to progress. From Amateur to Air Marshal.
- Accurate copter collision checking with Scratch effects.
- Autosave & load for all game modes.
